name: Pavestone RumbleStone Cafe Edger
description: Increasing the possibilities for creative expression in your backyard landscape, the new RumbleStone Edger by Pavestone makes decorative concrete edging around the lawn and garden area both attractive and functional. Use to border walkways, gardens, plant beds and tree rings. A quick and easy way to create order and organization around your yard or garden, Pavestone RumbleStone Edger is simple to install and will enhance your greenery while simplifying mowing and trimming chores.Use to border walkways, gardens, plant beds and tree ringsEasy to install for a quick decorative touch and simplified mowing and trimming choresDesigned to use as walkway, garden and plant bed bordersColor in concrete products may vary from pallet to pallet, please purchase your projects all at one timeNote: product may vary by store
